name: Team Umizoomi
description:
Use Pattern Power, Super Shapes, and Bot's Super Robot Computer to construct a submarine, rescue seahorses, and return missing rocket parts to the Astronaut Center! Build your math skills while having a blast in over 25 exciting games!

Features

• Use Mighty Math Powers to complete your missions!
• Collect shells as you zoom around in UmiCar!
• Build vehicles using Geo's Shape Belt!
